critical_limb_ischemia.name: Critical Limb Ischemia
critical_limb_ischemia.base_query: ("Ischemia"[MeSH] OR "Peripheral Arterial Disease"[MeSH] OR "Critical Limb Ischemia")

interventions.bypass: AND ("Bypass, Surgical"[MeSH] OR "distal bypass" OR "pedal loop" OR "tibial arch")

anatomy.tibial: AND ("anterior tibial" OR "posterior tibial" OR "tibial artery")

interventions.stent: AND ("Stents"[MeSH] OR "stent" OR "PCI" OR "percutaneous coronary intervention")
interventions.bypass: AND ("Coronary Artery Bypass"[MeSH] OR "CABG" OR "coronary bypass")

heart_failure.name: Heart Failure
heart_failure.base_query: ("Heart Failure"[MeSH] OR "Cardiac Failure" OR "Congestive Heart Failure")

query_builder.instructions: Combine base_query with relevant intervention and anatomy filters
query_builder.example: For CLI with distal bypass on foot: base_query + interventions.bypass + anatomy.foot + date_filter
